extension.description:
Kodi addon for accessing live TV channels from various romanian online platforms.
Supported platforms: - DigiOnline.ro - protvplus.ro
For each supported platform, user registration and login credentials are required in order to access the media content.
Visit https://www.digiromania.ro for more details. Visit https://protvplus.ro for more details.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not connected to or in any other way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, the XBMC foundation or any of the online platforms used by this add-on.
extension.news:
Starting with Kodi 19 (Matrix), Python 2.x is replaced with Python 3.x.
When installing the add-on, please make sure you're downloading and using the add-on version matching the Kodi release installed on your device.
Matching repository and package versions are listed below.
* 19.x.y.z addon version(s) ===> Kodi 19 (Matrix)
